Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

You should be proud.

You should be proud if you identify as LGBTQ. You should be proud if you fight for LGBTQ rights. You should be proud of the progress we’ve made together.

June is LGBTQ Pride Month, and there’s a lot to be proud of. There’s also a lot of work to do. Students are especially vulnerable — only 35 percent of students and school staff in Virginia are protected from discrimination based on their sexual orientation and gender identity.

We put together a guide for how you can make your school more inclusive.

The ACLU of Virginia staff also gathered our favorite songs celebrating LGBTQ pride. Jam out with us.

Other "must-knows" for June:

  • Hey, rock fans: Watch a video from guitar legend and ACLU ambassador Tom Morello on our fight for voting rights.
  • NOVA events: Our Northern Virginia chapter is hosting two upcoming events — their annual Crabfest at Fort Hunt National Park and a movie screening at the Old Town Alexandria Market Square.
  • Save the date: The ACLU of Virginia 50th Anniversary Celebration will be September 7 in Richmond, featuring civil rights activist Shaun King.

RSVP for all upcoming events.

Happy Pride Month!

ACLU of Virginia
